name: Plue's Adventures 2
description:
A text-based adaptation of a story by Hiro Mashima.

Unfortunately I did not have time to translate the game into English, I'm sorry. So the current version is only in Brazilian Portuguese.
-Read the devlog for more info-

Tools
  • Godot Engine - open-source game engine.
  • Twine - open-source tool for telling interactive, nonlinear stories.
  • LibreOffice Calc - open-source spreadsheet program (for csv l10n).

GitHub repo: https://github.com/williamd1k0/plues-adventures-2
